name: Daedalus Tower
description:
Daedalus Tower is a RPG styled in the fashion of Old School JRPGs like Dragon Quest and Shin Megami Tensei.

You play as a scorned inventor named Daedalus who was locked in a prison of his own creation. Now to escape he must survive 50 battles of increasing difficulty, using the random equipment and items given to him between battles.

Art/Story/Programming - Kirby012

Music/SFX - Shin#013
